name: Ematic Solutions Pte. Ltd
description: Developer of an email marketing platform designed to assist brands with generating revenue using an email channel. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence with automated email segmentation, enabling brands and digital marketers to grow their customer database and revenue from every campaign.
